abstract: Graphic novelist Frank Miller is set to release first issue of comic book series Dark Knight III: The Master Race; feels public will not tire of his ubiquitous, grim version of Batman character as long as dystopian world he inhabits continues to reflect real world problems.
lead_paragraph: Frank Miller, the creator of the “Dark Knight” Batman comics series, spoke about the character and the series ahead of the Wednesday release of the latest “Dark Knight” issue.

headline.main: ‘Dark Knight III: The Master Race’ Comic Book Prompts Reflection and a Look Ahead
headline.print_headline: ‘Dark Knight’ Returns to an Already Brooding World

snippet: Frank Miller, the creator of the “Dark Knight” Batman comics series, spoke about the character and the series ahead of the Wednesday release of the latest “Dark Knight” issue.
